remarks: Transfer existence from a variable ` x ` to another variable ` y ` contained in expression ` A ` .  Variant of ~ rexxfrd .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-Apr-2018.)
statement:
ralxfrd2.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. C ) -> A e. B ) $.
ralxfrd2.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> E. y e. C x = A ) $.
ralxfrd2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. C /\ x = A ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
rexxfrd2 $p |- ( ph -> ( E. x e. B ps <-> E. y e. C ch ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ps y $.
